text: Violetta Villas (born 10 June 1938 - 5 December 2011) was a Polish singer, actress, composer and songwriter. She was born in Verviers, Belgium. Her voice was a coloratura soprano which spans 4.7 octaves. In 1960s she was the star of revues in Paris, New York and Las Vegas.Witold Filler, Tygrysica z Magdalenki, 1993 She died in Lewin Klodzki, Poland. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2011 deaths Category:European opera singers Category:People from Verviers Category:Polish actors Category:Polish singers Category:Pop musicians Category:Stage actors
title: Violetta Villas
